articles.content: USADA chief executive Travis Tygart said the CAS decision -- which cut Russias proposed four-year ban to two years -- represented a significant loss for the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) and clean … [+4090 chars]

articles.author: Andrew van Leeuwen
articles.title: Reynolds splits with Erebus - Motorsport.com, Edition: Global
articles.description: David Reynolds has formally parted ways with Erebus Motorsport just one year into a decade-long deal.
articles.content:
The 2017 Bathurst 1000 winner has long been expected to split with the Holden squad off the back of a difficult 2020 campaign.
That included a breakdown of his relationship with Erebus CEO Barry Rya… [+2434 chars]

articles.title: Arsenals Leno backs Arteta blames players with bad attitude on poor form - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: Arsenal goalkeeper Bernd Leno has said that the players must shoulder the responsibility for the team's dismal form.
articles.content:
Arsenal goalkeeper Bernd Leno has said that the players must shoulder the responsibility for the team's dismal form and head coach Mikel Arteta is not to blame.
